microservices.name: cash-register
microservices.description: A JavaScript Cash Register web application.

microservices.name: countdown-timer
microservices.description: Countdown Timer is a JavaScript app that allows the user to set, pause, resume, and reset.

microservices.name: date-formatter
microservices.description: A project to learn methods and properties of the JavaScript Date object. It displays the date to the user in 3 different formats.

microservices.name: days-between-dates-calc
microservices.description: Calculate the number of days between two chosen dates. You can choose if you want to include the last day in your calculation.

microservices.name: decimal-to-binary-converter
microservices.description: A JavaScript app to convert base-10 numbers to binary.

microservices.name: palindrome-checker
microservices.description: A JavaScript project that checks if a user input is a palindrome or not.

microservices.name: phone-number-validator
microservices.description: A JavaScript application that checks if an entered number is a valid United States phone number.

microservices.name: roman-numeral-converter
microservices.description: A project that converts intergers ranging from 1 to 3999 to Roman numerals.

microservices.name: spreadsheet
microservices.description: A JavaScript spreadsheet application project that parses and evaluates mathematical expressions, implements spreadsheet functions, handles cell references, creates interactive web interfaces, and dynamically updates the page based on user input.

microservices.name: statistics-calculator
microservices.description: A JavaScript statistics calculator that takes a set of numbers and returns the mean, median, mode, variance, and standard deviation.

microservices.name: todo-app
microservices.description: A Todo Application JavaScript project to learn how to handle form inputs, manage local storage, perform CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations on tasks, implement event listeners, and toggle UI elements.

games.name: platformer-game
games.description: A basic JavaScript platformer game. Use the keyboard arrows to move the player and collect yellow checkpoints. Press the spacebar or up to jump.

games.name: rock-paper-scissors
games.description: Classic Rock Paper Scissors game where the player competes against the computer, each selecting rock, paper, or scissors, with the winner determined based on the classic rules of the game.

games.name: rpg-dragon-repeller
games.description: Dragon Repeller is a text-based RPG game built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. In this game, you navigate through different locations, fight monsters, upgrade your weapons, and ultimately face the dragon to save the town.

games.name: snake
games.description: A classic arcade game where the player controls a growing snake that must navigate a grid to eat food while avoiding collisions with itself or the walls.
